class.name: PLATEAUMeshData
class.brief_description: Container for extracted mesh data from CityGML.
class.description: PLATEAUMeshData holds extracted mesh geometry, transform, and attribute information from a CityGML file. It can contain child meshes forming a hierarchy.

method.name: get_mesh
method.description: Returns the ArrayMesh containing the geometry.

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Returns the transform for this mesh.

method.name: get_children
method.description: Returns an array of child [PLATEAUMeshData] objects.

method.name: get_child_count
method.description: Returns the number of child meshes.

method.name: get_child
method.description: Returns the child mesh at the specified index.

method.name: get_attribute
method.description: Get an attribute value by key. Supports nested keys with "/" separator (e.g., "bldg:measuredHeight").

method.name: has_city_object_info
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this mesh has associated CityObject information.

method.name: get_city_object_type_name
method.description: Returns the CityObject type as a human-readable string.

method.name: get_gml_id_from_uv
method.description: Get the GML ID from UV4 coordinates (used for raycast hit lookup).

method.name: get_texture_paths
method.description: Returns the texture file paths for each surface (used for export operations).

method.name: get_texture_path
method.description: Returns the texture file path for the specified surface index. Returns an empty string if no texture is assigned.

method.name: get_texture_path_count
method.description: Returns the number of texture paths stored for this mesh.

members.member: The name of this mesh node.
The GML ID of the associated CityObject.
